thread.title: BRIEF-Third Point LLC Takes Share Stake In MGM Resorts International, PG&E Corp

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Third Point LLC Takes Share Stake In MGM Resorts International, PG&E Corp
text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Third Point LLC :
* THIRD POINT LLC TAKES SHARE STAKE OF 3.0 MILLION SHARES IN MGM RESORTS INTERNATIONAL - SEC FILING
* THIRD POINT LLC TAKES SHARE STAKE OF 1.3 MILLION SHARES IN PG&E CORP
* THIRD POINT LLC - CHANGE IN HOLDINGS ARE AS OF DEC 31, 2017 AND COMPARED WITH THE PREVIOUS QUARTER ENDED AS OF SEPT 30, 2017 Source text for quarter ended Dec 31, 2017 : ( bit.ly/2ErRNh6 )
Source text for quarter ended Sept 30, 2017 : ( bit.ly/2o6O8OG )
